title: i have 1493rp and i need 2 rp for the new dungeon pass content
body:
im wondering if i can get 2rp from riot bc i want to buy the new dungeon pass content in the store. plz send help 

thank you for your time riot (:

Ign Simplè

replies.body:
Hmmmmm a measly 2 RP is all you need? Tell ya what, shoot me your best drawing of an arcade poro and I'll see what I can do!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
